Image: Khongoryn Els, Gurvansaikhan NP, Gobi desert, Mongolia.jpg

The Gobi Desert is the largest desert region in Asia and has long served as a buffer between the Mongolian steppe and China. The Great Wall of China follows the southern boundary of the desert. The desert's dry cold weather has made it one of the best places in the world for finding dinosaur bones.
It is possible to fly to Altai, Bayanhongor, and Dalanzadgad on one of the domestic airlines from

. Sainshand lies on the Trans-Mongolian Railway and can be reached by train. All parts of the region can be reached by bus from UB, however only Sainshand and Bayanhongor have paved roads connecting to the capital.
